title: Air Conditioned Comfort
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/United States - Description and travel
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/National parks and reserves - United States
description: A coarse, insensitive family drives through the National Parks in a luxurious camper, oblivious to the natural beauty around them. The family's only concern is in looking for real estate, finding the next burger stand and locating the next rest stop. For them the forest is just a place to toss gum wrappers. At the end of the day's travel, as they are parked in their camper, the family suddenly finds the tables turned in a surprising climax
